- The Newton Boys (1998) - This classic heist movie follows the story of the Newton gang, one of the most successful bank robbers in history.

- Shattered (1973) - This gripping crime drama centers on two detectives, Veronica Heart and Jane Lyon, who are assigned to take down a Russian crime boss lady who has the police department on her payroll and she has a unique way of taking out those who work against her.

- Elysium (2013) - This mind-bending science fiction film follows the story of two worlds, Earth and Elysium, which are in sharp contrast. One world is suffering from an overpopulation crisis, while the other world is inhabited by the very wealthy who live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth.
